mapper.select: select sum(case when payment_date like #{year}||'%' then payment_price end) from payment where payment_date like #{year}||'%' group by to_char(payment_date,'yy')

select sum(case when month like #{month}||'%' then payment_price end) AS SUM from ( select substr(payment_date,4,2) AS month, payment_price, payment_date from payment where payment_date like #{year}||'%' ) where month like #{month}||'%'
mapper.insert: insert into payment (order_num, payment_kind, payment_date, payment_price) values (#{orderNum} , #{paymentKind}, SYSDATE, #{paymentPrice})

insert into payment (order_num, payment_kind, payment_date, payment_price) values (#{orderNum} , #{paymentKind}, SYSDATE, (select sum(price_sum) from ( select c.qty * g.goods_price as price_sum from cart c, goods g, member m where m.member_num = c.member_num and c.goods_num = g.goods_num and m.member_num = #{memberNum} ) ) )
